thread.title: Golden Nugget Las Vegas Transforms Downtown Into Cowboy Town for Wranglers National Finals Rodeo, Dec. 3-11

author: cbs8
title: Golden Nugget Las Vegas Transforms Downtown Into Cowboy Town for Wranglers National Finals Rodeo, Dec. 3-11
text:
Golden Nugget Las Vegas
Resort will offer all-star country music series, meet-and-greet with riders, and more
LAS VEGAS , Sept. 29, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Boots and belt buckles will descend upon Golden Nugget Las Vegas for Wranglers National Finals Rodeo, Dec. 3-11 . The downtown resort and casino will offer a full lineup of rodeo activities, including viewing parties and meet-and-greets with riders, which will culminate nightly at The Grand Event Center, where the biggest names in country music will take the stage.
Headliners will include Tanya Tucker ( Dec. 3 ), Big and Rich ( Dec. 4 ), Trace Adkins ( Dec. 5 ), Terri Clark ( Dec. 6 ), Merle Haggard ( Dec. 7-8 ), LeAnn Rimes ( Dec. 9 ), and Alabama ( Dec. 10-11 ). All concerts will be held in The Grand Event Center following rodeo events at 10 p.m. each night. Tickets are now on sale with select shows starting at $39 , plus taxes and fees.
"NFR brings the best riders and their fans from around the country to Las Vegas and we, in turn, want to bring them the best entertainment options available," said Ron O'Neal , Director of Entertainment. "Our lineup of all-star entertainment features some of the most legendary artists to grace one stage and we're excited to welcome them to Las Vegas ."
In addition to the concert series, Golden Nugget will host closed-circuit viewing parties nightly in The Gordie Brown Showroom, where fans can catch all the NFR action up close. Doors open at 7 p.m. Admission to the viewing parties is free with food and drink specials available for purchase. The rodeo will also broadcast in the Race and Sports Book, Rush Lounge, Gold Diggers, and at various bars throughout the property.
On Wednesday, Dec. 9 , Golden Nugget will host an official Barrel Racer Autograph Session in front of The Grand Event Center, where guests will have the opportunity to meet and get autographs from 15 top rodeo stars.
Hotel room and hotel entertainment packages for Wrangler National Finals Rodeo at Golden Nugget Las Vegas, including concert tickets, are now on sale with room rates starting at $59 . For more information, or to book, visit www.goldennugget.com or call (800) 634-3454.
